name: Busy Like Bee
description:
If game lags download the zip file!

PRETEND TO BE A BEE
FEED HUNGRY HUNGRY BEARS
GET RICHHHHH

Coded/Gameplay: HmanHere

Art/Direction: Bountyhat

Music/Sfx: Captain Shafty

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrows

Interact: E or Space

Restart: Hold K and R (if on downloaded) Refresh tab (If on web)

Instructions:

Play as a busy little human pretending to be a bee. Keep track of bear customer's orders and deliver them their Honeyzzz! Go to the garden and plant a flower of the same honey color. Watch the flower grow and then click on it to command a bee to transform it into Honeyzz. Pick up the Honeyzz deliver it to the hungry bear and repeat! Work to get your inspector meter up by being a good honey chef. When it is full a panda inspector will arrive. Impress him and you can go up stars!


Leave star amounts in comments!

Updates to come!

Thank you!
